intro: The International Summer School on Software Engineering (ISSSE 2012) aims at providing a forum to let Master and fresh Ph.D. students get in touch with top Software Engineering scholars and the research they pursue.

lectures.name: Andrea De Lucia
lectures.affiliation: University of Salerno and University of Molise, Italy
lectures.title: Software Artefact Traceability Management and Recovery

lectures.name: Paul
lectures.title: Software Product Lines: Industrial Challenges and Opportunities for Research

lectures.name: Mira
lectures.title: Programming Language Concepts for Scalable Software Development

lectures.name: Matthias
lectures.affiliation: Chalmers University of Technology and University of Gothenburg, Sweden
lectures.title: Building Advanced Mechatronic Systems - A Software and Systems Engineering Perspective

lectures.name: Dag
lectures.title: Measuring the Effect of Agile Development Processes
